commit message: get rid of ugly hack in onLoadFinished, add listener for junit tests
update odf2html
add test project
update odf2html, use isPasswordValid again, implement fullscreen mode (also contains tons of displaymanager code)
add print function (uses google cloud print), add share function
update actionbarsherlock
add missing breaks in onMenuItemSelected
replace FILL_PARENTs with MATCH_PARENTs
use proguard, but dont obfuscate
use Holo_Light_Dialog theme on devices 11+
implement FindActionMode for jelly bean and up, split intro document into two in order to speed up startup
fix #23
rename onError to handleError in DocumentActivity just to make sure we unintentionally repeat bug #23
remove AndroidBillingLibrary, use pay-me instead
add bugsense and google analytics
disable activity tracking (we only have one activity)
add more translations
add changelog for next version, rename Print menu item to Google Cloud Print
update support library, update icons (androidicons.com!), implement spartanian TTS-support
move adView.destroy into onDestroy (caused nasty hangs at close)
fix and improve tts-feature
update odf2html
update proguard config for JS interfaces
update odf2html, set initial scale facot in PageView (needed for viewport to work), update intro
add 'rate this app'-dialog, fine-tweak analytics
update pay-me, update intro.odt, add link to google+ community, bump version
fix analytics user timing
update odf2html, bump version number (hopefully the last time)
update submodules, remove AndroidBillingLibrary artifacts from AndroidManifest
update ADT and translations, remove logging-lib, remove built-in google cloud print (use standalone app instead), raise version number and compile
